title: Lewy Bodies and Dimentia
description:
Description
Dementia study comparing two groups of patients
usage: A data frame with 39 observations on the following 3 variables.
reference: Brain MRIs were used to study the brains of patients with Dementia with Lewy Bodies, some of whom also were diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

parameters.MMSE: Change in functional performance on the Mini Mental State Examination
parameters.Type: DLB=Dementia with Lewy Bodies or DLB/AD=DLB and Alzheimer's Disease
parameters.APC: Annualized Percentage Change from baseline volume of the brain
